channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Office
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Office

item.title: CVE-2018-1026|2024-08-05T03:44:11.827Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20office
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Office Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Office. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-1030.

item.title: CVE-2018-1007|2024-08-05T03:44:11.897Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20office
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Microsoft Office improperly discloses the contents of its memory, aka "Microsoft Office Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Office. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-0950.

item.title: CVE-2018-1030|2024-08-05T03:44:11.975Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20office
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Office Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Office. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-1026.
